# DirectListingV3 interface

Represents a marketplace direct listing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DirectListingV3
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                    | Modifiers | Type                                | Description                                                                                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [asset](./sdk.directlistingv3.asset.md)                                     |           | [NFTMetadata](./sdk.nftmetadata.md) | The asset being listed.                                                                                                                                                      |
| [assetContractAddress](./sdk.directlistingv3.assetcontractaddress.md)       |           | [Address](./sdk.address.md)         | The address of the asset being listed.                                                                                                                                       |
| [creatorAddress](./sdk.directlistingv3.creatoraddress.md)                   |           | [Address](./sdk.address.md)         | The address of the creator of listing.                                                                                                                                       |
| [currencyContractAddress](./sdk.directlistingv3.currencycontractaddress.md) |           | [Address](./sdk.address.md)         | The address of the currency to accept for the listing.                                                                                                                       |
| [currencyValuePerToken](./sdk.directlistingv3.currencyvaluepertoken.md)     |           | CurrencyValue                       | The <code>CurrencyValue</code> of the listing. Useful for displaying the price information.                                                                                  |
| [endTimeInSeconds](./sdk.directlistingv3.endtimeinseconds.md)               |           | number                              | The end time of the listing.                                                                                                                                                 |
| [id](./sdk.directlistingv3.id.md)                                           |           | string                              | The id of the listing.                                                                                                                                                       |
| [isReservedListing](./sdk.directlistingv3.isreservedlisting.md)             |           | boolean                             | Whether the listing is reserved to be bought from a specific set of buyers.                                                                                                  |
| [pricePerToken](./sdk.directlistingv3.pricepertoken.md)                     |           | string                              | The price to pay per unit of NFTs listed.                                                                                                                                    |
| [quantity](./sdk.directlistingv3.quantity.md)                               |           | string                              | <p>The quantity of tokens to include in the listing.</p><p>For ERC721s, this value should always be 1 (and will be forced internally regardless of what is passed here).</p> |
| [startTimeInSeconds](./sdk.directlistingv3.starttimeinseconds.md)           |           | number                              | The start time of the listing.                                                                                                                                               |
| [status](./sdk.directlistingv3.status.md)                                   |           | [Status](./sdk.status.md)           | Whether the listing is CREATED, COMPLETED, or CANCELLED.                                                                                                                     |
| [tokenId](./sdk.directlistingv3.tokenid.md)                                 |           | string                              | The ID of the token to list.                                                                                                                                                 |
